topic.title: What happened to ZeroMarket?
topic.body: Are there no seeds or was it disabled? Or something else?

topic.title: Is there a way to use a post title as tab title in a Zero Blog?
topic.body: Currently a blog [post](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit/?Post:64:Status+report:+ZeroMail) uses `ZeroBlog - ZeroNet`. Is there a way to change it?

topic.title: Problem with unique account for site
topic.body:
> WebSocket handleRequest error: KeyError: 'cert' in UiWebsocket.py line 65 > UiWebsocket.py line 143 > UiWebsocket.py line 475 > User.py line 128


I'm running (GNU/)Linux. Does anyone know what's up?

topic.title: ZeroMail just launched, let's test it?
topic.body:
Post your email ID if you want people to send you a message.

Here's [ZeroMail](http://127.0.0.1:43110/Mail.ZeroNetwork.bit)

1_19Zt6kPNMNDCSF1PUhRzGZm4WfZQUBTDPc.body: I'm new too, anything cool you've found here?

1_1QH84f44yLPvMjMua9s7iM7c4RoJNZ2nTp.body:
> [o4zw5vmpoz5hz78z](#comment_66_1KTjPe9MxoYkcXj78GuZgCcj3R3f3Twh7r): i think it is not developed yet :)

Nice! Thank you :D

> [dividedby0](#comment_1_16iYwD5U2fNoS22p6447J7992iL3DHjSHY): Same question about ZeroMart, is that also in development?

Just noticed `(coming soon)` written there. So it's probably in development as well.

2783_1KbV1e1u6P6AsY8XNBydgtbtN8iSB5WMyG.body: Assuming that is him, are there any obvious downsides on "going public"? Is it about his safety?

> [otoman](#comment_4_1QH84f44yLPvMjMua9s7iM7c4RoJNZ2nTp): Assuming that is him, are there any obvious downsides on "going public"? Is it about his safety?

Holy shit "[Reported bitcoin 'founder' Craig Wright's home raided by Australian police ](http://www.theguardian.com/technology/2015/dec/09/bitcoin-founder-craig-wrights-home-raided-by-australian-police)"

2_1QH84f44yLPvMjMua9s7iM7c4RoJNZ2nTp.body:
> [nofish](#comment_127_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): No API command to modify window title yet, but its a good idea and simple to add.

Cool! :)

3_168qV1Xxp2EyszrzdECLUwXrn9wGYjDdar.body:
> [peerhelper](#comment_3_1KKg234YUiRqybCsKpqRsNmFBaSSDB12L1): My blog from my other account, cgm616: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1N9pXXwAVadHQnFBj1DZhpdiHRva5Dix8b

Your blog is great! I've seen it elsewhere. Any updates on ZeroIndex?

Do you know those times when you want to decide things with a coin, but you don't have a coin with you? Well, [Flip a Coin](http://127.0.0.1:43110/186uLipEzvVvQL3AUNAe6ypLFpftknmT9c) is here for the rescue! 

Choose before clicking: Heads or Tails?
